name: control_documental
description: Backend del sistema de seguimiento y control documental Virgen Niña

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test FORCE=true node index.js && sequelize db:seed:all --env test --seeders-path src/seeders/ && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test --migrations-path src/migrations && sequelize db:migrate --env test --migrations-path src/migrations && NODE_ENV=test mocha --timeout 30000 test/**/**/*.js
scripts.setup: FORCE=true node index.js && sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path src/seeders && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --migrations-path src/migrations && sequelize db:migrate --migrations-path src/migrations

author: Adrian Marcelo Berazain Mallea
